modName: Cassandra Frost Witch Outfit UUNP - CBBE
summary:
A new craftable light Elven or cloth outfit and a crystal staff.

Has three hat sizes to fit most hair and an optional skirt and underwear.

Available for UNP, UUNP BodySlide, CBBE, CBBE HDT, CBBE BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-3-1439381237.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412459723.png[/img]

This outfit requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels System[/url]!

For the recipes to appear in the crafting interface you need to have the [url=http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439293687.png]crafting manual[/url] in your inventory!

In order to equip the staff on your back you need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen[/url].

Bodyslide files work best with the latest OS standalone version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Ousnius and Caliente[/url].

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]E3Tf1Fp0Vu8[/youtube] [youtube]GpQvZLPINso[/youtube]
[youtube]LX2e0DtVd3I[/youtube] [youtube]PvZfHNiO-V0[/youtube]
Thank you!

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412459723.png[/img]

A new craftable light Elven or cloth outfit and a crystal staff.

Has three hat sizes to fit most hair and optional underwear.

Available for UNP, UUNP BodySlide, CBBE, CBBE HDT, CBBE BodySlide.

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-5-1439381236.png[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412459723.png[/img]

This is the fifteenth armor of the series. It was suggested to me by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/883544/?]Nermal_66[/url] and it's from a comic character from the Tales from Oz. Here is the [url=http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_large/6/67663/3676937-03a.jpg]picture[/url] I used as a guide.

You can find the crafting manual inside the Midden, below College of Winterhold.
*It's on the table near the Atronach Forge along with all the materials needed to craft the outfit once. Just look around a bit.

I hope you enjoy it! :)

The idea of this series originated from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/]Minidresses Collection mod by Tiwa44[/url] who is doing an awesome job converting some of the long dresses to mini versions.

[b]A big THANK YOU to all who donate, endorse, comment or just play using this and the previous mods![/b]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1442736357.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460420.png[/img]
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439293687.png[/img]
[i][font=Times New Roman]*All the materials needed to craft the outfit once are near as well. Just look around a bit.[/font][/i]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413848639.png[/img]

- Cloth Version

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412746639.png[/img]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68765/?]Cassandra Frost Witch 7B TBBP by inky84[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68748/?]UUNP Cassandra Frost Witch Slider Set GF by Gamefever[/url].

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB by gutris1[/url]

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-4-1439381237.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412746640.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412746640.png[/img]

Using High Heels Versions without HDT High Heels System will cause your game to crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1439381237.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by deleting [b]Cassandra Frost Witch.esp[/b] from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folders [b]CassandraWitch[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ folders.

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1439381237.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412460007.png[/img]

Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by Xs2reality[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url]
Idles and Poses: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28978/?]Pretty Motion Package by Dualsun[/url]
House: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63552/?]Halamshiral - Mage Tower by Elianora[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url] ... sort of!

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460007.png[/img]

If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit/contact the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely at Skyrim Nexus as long as you credit my work in the comments.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412460007.png[/img]

Robe [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
Hat, Skirt [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11767/?]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP by Backsteppo[/url]
Cloak [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/url]
Legwraps, Bracers [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
Boots [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36393/?]UNP High Heels by Petrovich[/url]

Many thanks to

The team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - Without which the CBBE versions would not have been possible.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Ousnius[/url] for all the time he has spent offering help and tips on using Outfit Studio and
for making the UUNP and CBBE conversions.

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439381237.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866875.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439287909.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1437281401.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436265048.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67180/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1435216507.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1434516218.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419535175.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1416902361.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1415093656.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866635.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412409808.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911872.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1410097182.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?][img]http://static
